channel.title: Caprica
channel.description:
Any of you watching this?
It's even better than I thought and somehow manages to be less dark than Battlestar Galactica.
The only thing that nags me is how dull young Bill Adama is but I'm pretty sure that character development will fix that.
I'm really curious to see how the show will tie into the BSG plot, mainly the Cylon's motivation to do what they did.

item.title: Caprica
item.dc:creator: TheeGoatPig
item.description:
Codgin:

is there anything you do like to watch? lol

Burn Notice, Bones, NCIS, White Collar, CSI: Vegas, The Ultimate Fighter, Family Guy (I think that does it for current shows), Farscape, Firefly, Seinfeld, The Simpsons (up through season 12 or so), The Sopranos, Rome, Band of Brothers, Star Trek (original series, if I’m in a goofy mood), Stargate, Stargate Atlantas, Magnum PI, Wings, Rockford Files, Quantum Leap, Battlestar Galactica (original series).

Yes, there are shows that I like.

Read full topic

item.title: Caprica
item.dc:creator: Caprica6
item.description:
I’ve seen the pilot and the first episode (US pace) and am loving it so far

Not sure how much to comment on particulars as don’t want to spoil anything for anyone who’s not seen it yet. Agree with your comment about Bill, am sure the character will develop hugely over the first season.

The pilot had some pretty disturbing scenes in it, almost as dark as some of the things in BSG but not quite.

Am really happy that the UK is only one week behind the US and we get it in HD too

Read full topic
